Question: Which FilterTank?
Constraint/Rule: if (FilterTankModule.FilterTankXLModule) {FilterTank = FilterTankXL;}if (FilterTankXLModule*.CAFilterTankXLModule) {FilterTank = FilterTankXL;}if (FilterTankModule.FilterTankSModule) {FilterTank = FilterTankS;}if (FilterTankSModule*.CAFilterTankSModule) {FilterTank = FilterTankS;}if (FilterTankSModule*.CBFilterTankSModule) {FilterTank = FilterTankS;}if (FilterTankXLModule*.CBFilterTankXLModule) {FilterTank = FilterTankXL;}if (FreshwaterTank*.FreshwaterTankXL) {FilterTank = FilterTankXL;WastewaterTankXL = true;}if (WastewaterTankXL) {FilterTank = FilterTankXL;FreshwaterTank* = FreshwaterTankXL;}

Question: Which FreshwaterTank*?
Constraint/Rule: if (FreshwaterTankModule.FreshwaterTankSModule) {FreshwaterTank* = FreshwaterTankS;}if (WastewaterTankXL) {FilterTank = FilterTankXL;FreshwaterTank* = FreshwaterTankXL;}if (FilterTank.FilterTankXL) {FreshwaterTank* = FreshwaterTankXL;WastewaterTankXL = true;}

Question: WastewaterTankXL?
Constraint/Rule: if (WastewaterTankXLModule) {WastewaterTankXL = true;}if (FreshwaterTank*.FreshwaterTankXL) {FilterTank = FilterTankXL;WastewaterTankXL = true;}if (FilterTank.FilterTankXL) {FreshwaterTank* = FreshwaterTankXL;WastewaterTankXL = true;}
